it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.items

Interface Weapon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockWeapon, WeaponImpl

    public interface Weapon
    Weapon currently in a Player's inventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void discharge()
      Changes the state of the weapon after it has been used.

      Retrieves this card's id
      Player getOwner()
      Retrieves this weapon's owner

      Checks that this weapon is loaded

      Reloads this weapon
